articles.title: Greetings to Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Senegalese President
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Macky Sall, president of the Republic of Senegal, on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the president of Senegal good health and happiness and the Senegalese people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Slams "Nuclear Security Summit"
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Slams "Nuclear Security Summit"
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA on Monday accusing the U.S. of vociferating about "nuclear threat" from the DPRK at the 4th "Nuclear Security Summit":
					 The 4th "Nuclear Security Summit" took place in Washington recently to discuss the issues of nuclear terrorism, prevention of nuclear proliferation and reduction of strategic nuclear weapons.
					
					 During the summit the U.S. worked hard to stir up the atmosphere of sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK by prodding Japan, south Korea and other followers into creating impressions that the "nuclear threat" from the DPRK is the biggest problem facing the international community.
					
					 This is nothing but a crafty artifice to cover up the U.S. true colors as the world's biggest nuclear criminal and evade the blame for the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Obama received the Nobel Peace Prize for advocating "a world without nuclear weapons" from the beginning of his office but became a swindler who has done nothing till now close to its end as he has been engrossed in modernizing nuclear weapons and posing a nuclear threat to the world.
					
					 The above-said summit has taken place four times but the prospect of denuclearization of the world is becoming gloomier. On the contrary, nuclear weapons are posing a greater threat to global peace and security. It is by no means fortuitous that the international community is claiming Obama is chiefly to blame for this.
					
					 Upset by this, the Obama group is trying hard to evade the accusations by taking issue with the DPRK, a trite method.  But this is a foolish act.
					
					 The atrocities the U.S. perpetrated by dropping A-bombs on mankind are the thrice-cursed monstrous crimes.
					
					 The U.S. is the world's nuclear criminal who has worked hard to maintain its hegemonic position by recklessly wielding a nuclear stick, regarding nuclear threat and blackmail as the tenet of its foreign policy.
					
					 This is an undeniable historical fact hard to hide and a stark reality.
					
					 It is well known that the Bush administration had posed a nuclear threat to the DPRK since it designated the anti-U.S. independent states including the DPRK as "axis of evil" and targets of preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 The Obama administration has squandered a fabulous amount of funds for modernizing nuclear weapons, far from doing anything for denuclearization quite contrary to its advocacy of building "a world without nuclear weapons." After adopting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK as its policy, it is staging madcap drills under the simulated conditions of a nuclear war by introducing all type strategic nuclear strike means into the Korean peninsula
					
					 Since the Obama administration took office, the U.S. strategic nuclear strike means introduced into south Korea have increased several times, far from decreasing in their scope and number, and its nuclear war drills have become more provocative in their nature.
					
					 The U.S. is, at the same time, escalating the hostile moves against the DPRK to the maximum, openly revealing its intention to screw up the political and economic pressure on the DPRK by setting in motion its followers and allies for the implementation of the UN "resolution on sanctions" cooked up against the DPRK's inevitable choice for self-defense.
					
					 This is the truth about the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and the cause of escalating tension.
					
					 Confrontation and danger of a war are escalating in Northeast Asia as the U.S. is seeking to tighten the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military cooperation and, furthermore, form a new military bloc for aggression under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The prevailing situation more urgently requires than ever before the DPRK to bolster the nuclear deterrent for self-defence as it serves as a treasured sword to ensure the sovereignty and prosperity of the country and protect the global peace and security.
					
					 The DPRK's bolstering up of its nuclear deterrent in every way is an inevitable choice and a legitimate exercise of the right to self-defence to cope up with the U.S. extreme nuclear threat and blackmail and nuclear war moves.
					
					 As already clarified, the DPRK will take decisive toughest countermeasures against the U.S. ever-escalating nuclear war threat and pressure in the future, too.

articles.title: Collection of Students' Writings Published
articles.content:
Collection of Students' Writings Published
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Volume 12 "May Country of General Kim Jong Il Shine", collection of students' writings and compositions, was brought out in the DPRK.
					The collection shows more than 400 children's songs, children's verses, lyric poems, essays and short stories created by 144 schoolchildren together with their photos.
					
					The writings reflect undying revolutionary careers and exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu who devoted everything to the bright future of the younger generations and the ardent yearnings and profound reverence of schoolchildren for the peerlessly great persons.
					
					Some works represent the resolutions of schoolchildren to further glorify the great Kim Il Sung's country, General Kim Jong Il's country all over the world by cherishing deep in their minds the solicitude shown by the mother party which takes good care of seeds that took roots in the land of Juche literature and lets them bring their talents into full bloom. The collection also introduces authors, motives of creation and assessment of the works.

articles.title: Party Organizations and Officials Called for Creating New Spirit of Era
articles.content:
Party Organizations and Officials Called for Creating New Spirit of Era
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The ongoing 70-day campaign of loyalty towards the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) demands party organizations and officials intensify political and ideological work in an offensive way so as to create the new spirit representing the Mallima era on all fronts and in sectors.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an editorial.
					
					 To conduct the political and ideological work in an offensive way means to correctly set the key part in implementing the immediate tasks put forward by the party and conduct political and ideological work in purposeful and intentional way, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The WPK's calling for conducting the political and ideological work in purposeful and intentional way is the manifestation of the steadfast will to hasten the final victory of the revolution, upholding the banner of the Juche-based theory of giving importance to ideology.
					
					 Very great are the victorious successes achieved during the 70-day campaign so far.
					
					 The remaining days of the campaign are the vital period for all the service personnel and people to dash forward for the bigger victory and the greater surge with redoubled efforts.
					
					 The main way of implementing the WPK's plan and determination to glorify its Seventh Congress as the greatest heyday of the revolution is to conduct ideological and political work with all efforts.
					
					 The great victory of the 70-day campaign precisely means the might of the intensive political and ideological work.
					
					 All the party organizations and officials should bear in mind the essence and importance of the intensive political and ideological work and vigorously wage the ideological work in the day-and-night advance of the 70-day campaign.

articles.title: DPRK Will Exercise Right to Powerful Preemptive Strike: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Exercise Right to Powerful Preemptive Strike: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The confrontational frenzy of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors has reached the worst phase.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says:
					
					 The ignorant aggressors and gangsters wielding the force of injustice bereft of common sense and reason have to be smashed only by force.
					
					 The right to preemptive strike is not the U.S. monopoly, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK will legitimately exercise its powerful right to preemptive strike in order to prevent another war on this land and protect the supreme dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK forever.
					
					 Its strategic rockets tipped with nuclear warheads will inflict baptism of fire on the dens of evils.
					
					 Its strike will wipe out the citadels of aggression at one blow reflecting the nation's cherished desire.
					
					 The U.S. mainland will not escape a tragedy of getting scorched in face of the DPRK's strike of justice, no matter how vast and far away it is.
					
					 The world will clearly see which is more powerful, the U.S. force of injustice or Songun Korea's force of justice.

articles.title: U.S. Takes off Its Deceptive Mask: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Takes off Its Deceptive Mask: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Recently U.S. media, reminding the readers of the on-going U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, said whenever the military plays with fire in south Korea, it committed reconnaissance and watch of the highest level chiefly aimed at the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 According to it, in recent years the U.S. conducted dimensional watch on the DPRK by way of combining all the cyber and ground watch equipment and watch apparatuses installed on satellites, manned reconnaissance planes, drones, warships, etc., pursuant to the already worked out scenario for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says this clearly proves once again the ulterior intention sought by the U.S. imperialists who have described the joint military exercises as "defensive and annual ones" in recent years.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the enemies are chiefly watching the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its high-ranking officials and even the residence of its supreme leadership, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 All the service personnel and people of the DPRK are hardening their will to take a thousand-fold revenge on the enemies as they are staging "beheading operation" in the test nuclear war, not content with daring  perpetrate reconnaissance and watch on the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The high treason to get the sun eclipsed deserves the most disastrous and miserable price.
					
					 The strike operation of the Korean style which has been bolstered for decades to fight the final decisive battle against the brigandish U.S. imperialists will be a retaliatory one unimaginable in the world, and it will wipe out the American empire, the den of evils, so that it might not survive on our planet.

articles.title: Peace Will Come When Park Geun Hye Regime Ends: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Peace Will Come When Park Geun Hye Regime Ends: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean people will face great misfortune and disasters if the puppet conservative group wins the 20th election of the "National Assembly" again, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article.
					 Noting that the Park Geun Hye group's holding the majority of the seats of the "National Assembly" will lead to the prolonging of the remaining days of the confrontation regime and regime of traitors, the article goes on:
					
					 It is needless to say that the regime will increase the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and drive the south Korean people to the extreme uneasiness and horror.
					
					 The present puppet ruling quarters are hordes of unpardonable traitors as they have deceived the people and run amuck in the moves to ignite a nuclear war while freezing the north-south relations by unprecedented confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 If such heinous confrontation maniacs and warmongers are allowed to win the general election to dominate the "NA", it will not be possible to thaw the frozen north-south relations nor will it be possible to remove the extreme danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 In a word, the south Korean people can never have a sound sleep for even a single night.
					
					 Peace will come and south Korean people will be able to enjoy vital rights only when an end is put to the confrontation regime and the group of traitors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Military Bosses' Foolish Acts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Military Bosses' Foolish Acts
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Traitor Han Min Gu, puppet defense minister of south Korea, went to the MLRS unit in the area along the Military Demarcation Line some days ago where he called for "squarely countering provocation of someone" and blared that "provocation is a self-ruin". On the same day, Ri Sang Hun, puppet commander of the Marine Corps, went to the Second Division of the corps and cried out for "being bold to pull trigger of punishment". He went to gentries of the corps in Kimpho and called for "overpowering" and adopting "mental posture".
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Monday says this is aimed to prevent the daily mounting war-weary spirit and vacillation among soldiers of the puppet army.
					
					 And the commentary goes on:
					
					 No matter how desperately the bosses of the puppet army may cry out for "punishment" and "mental posture", they cannot put the fear-stricken soldiers under control.
					
					 They were so foolish as to bluster they would match the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army with scarecrows seized with extreme war phobia involved. 
					
					 Traitors Han Min Gu and Ri Sang Hun would be well advised to understand that they would be reduced to departed souls by stealth as they go reckless, not being aware of where they stand now.
					
					 The puppet warmongers should watch their steps if they want to go scot-free.

articles.title: KCNA on Nuclear Criminals' Impudent Remarks on Denuclearization
articles.content:
KCNA on Nuclear Criminals' Impudent Remarks on Denuclearization
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. hosted the 4th "Nuclear Security Summit" shortly ago.
					 The summit was no more than the anti-DPRK nuclear racket kicked up by the U.S. and other nuclear criminals and its followers to pass the buck for the escalating nuclear threat on to the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S., Japanese and south Korean chief executives were closeted together over the issue of creating the impressions that the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons escalated the tension on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world. This was profound confusing of the right and wrong. 
					
					 Obama claimed that the international community is exposed to threat due to ceaseless provocations of the north such as nuclear tests and missile launches and that international cooperation would be boosted with allies and partners to achieve the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula. Echoing his master's utterances, Abe blustered that the north's improvement of nuclear and missile capability poses a direct threat to the international community and it is necessary to slap harsher sanctions.
					
					 Not to lag behind her masters Park Geun Hye reeled off a flurry of sophism that south Korea joined the U.S. in its efforts to build a world without nuclear weapons but the north is blatantly challenging the efforts of the international community. She went the lengths of jabbering that the building of a world without nuclear weapons should start from the Korean peninsula, adding that it is necessary to make the north realize that it can not live unless it dismantles nuclear weapons.
					
					 This is the ridiculous behavior of the fool who feign ignorance of how nuclear issue was spawned on the peninsula though they are well aware of it.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the peninsula was spawned by the U.S. from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat has further increased for several decades since the group of aggressors floated the story of "dropping A bombs" on the northern half of Korea in the last Korean War.
					
					 Every year the U.S. has undisguisedly staged nuclear war drills against the DPRK with various type nuclear weapons involved since the U.S. preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK was adopted as a state policy.
					
					 Even at this moment, more than 300,000 huge forces of the U.S. and south Korean puppet army and U.S. nuclear strategic weaponry including B-52 nuclear strategic bombers, nuclear submarines and nuclear carrier task force are busy with nuclear war rehearsals.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that this is a serious infringement upon the security and peace of the DPRK and a direct threat to the lives of the Korean people. 
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and joint military exercises are the root cause of the danger of a nuclear conflict on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It was quite just and inevitable for the DPRK to have had access to nuclear weapons and taken measures to bolster up them now that the U.S. and its followers have become keen to threaten the DPRK with nuclear weapons and encroach upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has stockpiled the world's largest number of nuclear weapons and committed a hideous nuclear crime by using nuclear weapons for the first time in the world. The puppet forces turned south Korea into the advanced nuclear base of the U.S. Japan is possessed of massive amount of plutonium. They are vociferating about "threat" from someone. This is nonsensical and the height of deception of justice and peace.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the international community today comments that the way of settling the issue of the Korean peninsula is to acknowledge the DPRK as a nuclear power and opt for improving the DPRK-U.S. relations.
					
					 Defying this fact, nuclear criminals led by the U.S. is talking about the DPRK's dismantlement of nuclear weapons and denuclearization of the Korean peninsula. This is Don Quixote way of thinking and a pipe dream.
					
					 The DPRK has already clarified that there can never be denuclearization of the Korean peninsula without that of the world.
					
					 The denuclearization of the Korean peninsula is unimaginable unless nuclear powers including the U.S. completely defuse worldwide nuclear threat through nuclear disarmament negotiations and the White House opts for improving the DPRK-U.S. relations,
					
					 "Threat from the north" and "international cooperation for the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula" which the U.S., chieftain of nuclear war, and its servants have touted so much are, in fact, no more than a desperate shriek of those taken aback by the tremendous nuclear deterrence of the DPRK.
					
					 The more loudly the U.S. and its followers vociferate about "nuclear threat" from the DPRK while shelving their own nuclear issue, the more saliently they will reveal their attempt for nuclear monopoly to dominate the world.
					
					 The DPRK categorically rejects the groundless story about denuclearization of the Korean peninsula and will decisively counter the hostile forces with nuclear deterrence for self-defence, should they seek to encroach upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK even a bit.

articles.title: Insurance Frauds Disclosed at Special Units of S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Insurance Frauds Disclosed at Special Units of S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Insurance frauds were disclosed at special units of the south Korean puppet army, MBC of south Korea said.
					 According to it, those who served special units or those on active duty made false diagnosis in collusion with hospital sides and received insurance money for persons with disabilities. 
					
					 They received insurance money by making false certificates that they suffered from diseases while on duty and submitting them to insurance companies or by forging insurance documents.

articles.title: S. Korean Part-time Workers Call for Rights to Labor
articles.content:
S. Korean Part-time Workers Call for Rights to Labor
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Part-time workers under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on March 31.
					 Speakers at the press conference said recently the "Saenuri Party" openly opposed continuous job offer, which was an election commitment of the present executive chief.
					
					 The KCTU urged all political parties to ensure vital rights of part-time workers but the "Saenuri Party" alone did not reply, they said, and went on:
					
					 The present "National Assembly" has always backed plutocrats while evading answers to the workers' demand.
					
					 They demanded the authorities ensure sustained jobs, guarantee basic rights for indirect employed and special employees, withdraw discrimination of part-time jobs, raise minimum wage, etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Figure Brands Park Geun Hye as Swindler
articles.content:
S. Korean Figure Brands Park Geun Hye as Swindler
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Saram Ilbo on March 29 carried an article written by Kwak Tong Gi, permanent researcher at the Uri Institute for Social Studies of south Korea.
					 The article ridiculed Park Geun Hye as "master hand" at swindles as she reneged on the commitments she made in the 2012 "presidential election".
					
					 It charged that in the election Park deceived people, holding the slogan of "prepared woman 'president'".

articles.title: General Strike Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
General Strike Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Seoul branch of the educational public service headquarters of the Public Transport Trade Union under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions launched a general strike on April 1 demanding the abolition of the discrimination against part-time jobs, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 A rally on the general strike took place outside the Seoul City Education Agency.
					
					 Speakers said that part-time workers of schools are working under the poorest condition, receiving the minimum wages and feeling uneasiness of employment.
					
					 They demanded the city education agency hold negotiations with detailed proposal and take a measure for improving the treatment for part-time workers.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demo.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Calls for Defusing Danger of War
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Calls for Defusing Danger of War
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) - The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea issued an article on March 31 expressing the stand of the body to defuse the danger of war on the Korean peninsula.
					 The article accused the U.S., Japanese and south Korean authorities of getting closeted to intensify "sanctions against the north" at a time when the nuclear confrontation has reached the worst phase on the peninsula.
					
					 It said that the past history proves the issue cannot be settled through the sanctions and military pressure on the north.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the north compelled it to have access to nuclear weapons, it said, urging the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the north and opt for negotiations for concluding a peace treaty on the peninsula.
					
					 It demanded the U.S., Japan and south Korea stop at once the moves for building the triangular missile defense system and military alliance.

articles.title: Harsh Acts Unabated at S. Korean Schools
articles.content:
Harsh Acts Unabated at S. Korean Schools
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that harsh acts against freshmen occurred at a private university in Pusan, south Korea on March 31, sparking off public furor, according to south Korean News 1.
					 A photo of seniors binding freshmen at a classroom and pouring garbage over their heads was made to public, stunning all people.
					
					 Two students were killed by violence, not less than two months after entering a high school in Jinju City, South Kyongsang Province.
					
					 A secondary school student in Namgu, Kwangju City jumped from an apartment house, unable to stand violence at school.
					
					 Sexual abuses and violence against woman teachers and schoolgirls have become common practices.
					
					 Problematic is that the puppet regime is turning a blind eye to such violence.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling and Opposition Parties Spark Disgust
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling and Opposition Parties Spark Disgust
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- CBS of south Korea reported that the ruling and opposition parties are busying themselves to win people's mindset with various symbolic colors on the threshold of the puppet national assembly election.
					 Nomination fluctuation resembling a drama shown by all parties and a nerve war around solidarity of the opposition camp aroused the electors' disgust for politics, the radio said.
					
					 It called for making politics of true colors.

articles.title: Halt to Discrimination against Korean Schools in Japan Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to Discrimination against Korean Schools in Japan Demanded
 Tokyo, April 2 (KNS-KCNA) -- Director generals of Korean schools in Japan, representatives of the Council of Principals of Korean High Schools and the Liaison Council of Societies of Mothers for Korean Schools and students of Tokyo Korean Secondary and High School held a press conference in Tokyo on March 30 to denounce the unreasonable discrimination policy of the Japanese government against Korean schools in Japan.
					 A joint statement was read out at the press conference.
					
					 It said that the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on March 29 sent local autonomous bodies a notice calling for "sufficient examination" of payment of subsidies to Korean schools and "proper and transparent execution pursuant to purport and aim of subsidies", taking issue with the Korean schools in Japan which have nothing to do with diplomacy and security issues.
					
					 It termed this a very politically-motivated and discriminative step.
					
					 It demanded the ministry roll back its unreasonable notice and stop at once the discriminative step against Korean schools.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Posted by South African Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Posted by South African Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was posted by the South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on March 27.
					 Also posted on the website was his photo.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences, Works Studied in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences, Works Studied in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars and reading sessions on the reminiscences and works of President Kim Il Sung were held in Romania, Austria, Guinea and Nigeria between March 16 and 29.
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania at the seminar on the President's reminiscences "With the Century" praised him as the great leader who was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family, embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, founded the Juche idea and steered the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					 The chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna and a deputy battalion commander of a commando of the Ministry of Defense of Guinea said at the reading session on the President's reminiscences that the reminiscences of Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people, are an encyclopedia clarifying the valuable truth of the struggle for accomplishing the cause of human independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said after reading the President's work "The Fundamental Way of Achieving Victory in the Revolution Is to Strengthen the Party and Increase Its Leadership Role":
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea that the popular masses are the masters of the revolution and construction and they also promote the revolution and construction, in the course of his carving out a new way for the Korean revolution. 
					
					 The President always settled all issues by giving top priority to the demand and interest of the people and consolidated the unity and cohesion of the party and the popular masses in every way.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Germany, Poland and Bangladesh from March 24 to 27 to mark his birth anniversary.
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos documenting the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and their works.
					
					 Books and photos introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK were also on display.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association said the President devoted his whole life to the happiness of the Korean people and national reunification, expressing the will to widely introduce the greatness of the President and the reality of the DPRK making daily progress.
					
					 The chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army and other speakers noted that the President turned the DPRK into a socialist power under the banner of the Juche idea, Songun idea and devoted his all to national reunification till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The speakers of Bangladesh praised the President for making tremendous contributions to the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people and the sacred cause of global independence.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held at hospitals and an enterprise of Ethiopia on March 25 and 28 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The speakers praised the President as the greatest man recognized by the world as he embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and devoted his whole life to the independence and prosperity of Korea and the cause of human independence.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Pakistan, Egypt and Mexico between March 22 and 30 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The reporter and speakers including Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, said:
					
					 The President was a prominent leader in the 20th century and the great sun as he indicated the way for humankind. He founded the undying Juche idea, beat down U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation and developed the DPRK into a socialist power. He successfully settled the issue of succession to the leadership.
					
					 They praised the President as the great teacher who victoriously led the cause of global independence.
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt and chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, said in a report that it was thanks to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un that the DPRK has always achieved victories in the tempests of history.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and other speakers spoke highly of the ideological and theoretical feats and leadership feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Slovenia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Slovenia
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Maribor City on March 31.
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in various forms and ways.

articles.title: Bulgarian Figure Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Bulgarian Figure Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, made public a statement on March 29 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for their war moves against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military drills being staged on the Korean peninsula are escalating confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The DPRK has the right to self-defense.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military drills are dangerous ones.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the drills.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are to blame for the present situation.
					
					 They should immediately stop the reckless acts for confrontation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 56o aniversario de independencia de Senegal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 56o aniversario de independencia de Senegal
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este lunes un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Senegal, Macky Sall, con motivo del 56o aniversario de la independencia de este pais africano. 
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion de larga historia entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas conforme a los intereses mutuos de los pueblos de ambos paises, el remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario buena salud y felicidad, y al pueblo senegales progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: RPDC respondera con rotunda contramedida a creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
RPDC respondera con rotunda contramedida a creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC) formulada en relacion con que con motivo de la  "4a Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" Estados Unidos hablo tanto de la "amenaza nuclear" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores dio el dia 4 la siguiente respuesta:
					Recientemente, tuvo lugar en Washington la "4a cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" para discutir el problema del terrorismo nuclear, la prevencion de proliferacion nuclear y la reduccion de armas nucleares estrategicas.
					
					Durante el foro, EE.UU, intento exacerbar el ambiente de presion anti-RPDC instigando a Japon, el Sur de Corea y otras fuerzas seguidoras e induciendo en error la opinion publica como si la "amenaza nuclear" de la RPDC fuera el problema mas delicado enfrentado por la sociedad internacional.
					
					Todo esto no pasa de ser una perversa astucia para ocultar la naturaleza como criminal nuclear del mundo y evitar la responsabilidad del autor del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Desde el primer periodo de su mandato Obama abogaba tanto del "mundo libre de armas nucleares" para obtener el premio Nobel de la paz, pero hasta la fecha ha recurrido a la modernizacion de armas nucleares y la amenaza nuclear, asi que a finales de su mandato no hizo ni una cosa para este fin.
					
					Se realizo hasta hoy en dia en cuatro ocasiones la "cumbre de seguridad nuclear". Sin embargo, la desnuclearizacion del mundo se ha hecho mas oscura y se ha creado la situacion en que las armas nucleares amenazan mas la paz y la seguridad del mundo y la opinion internacional condena categoricamente a Obama diciendo que la responsabilidad principal recae sobre el mandatario norteamericano.
					
					Muy pasmado, Obama nos acusa absurdamente con metodo predilecto para evitar la censura dirigida a si mismo.
					
					La atrocidad de EE.UU., que cayo sobre la humanidad las bombas atomicas, deviene el acto criminal de categoria especial a ser censurado y castigado duramente por la humanidad.
					
					EE.UU. es el criminal nuclear mundial que se desespera para mantener su posicion hegemonica esgrimiendo el garrote nuclear tras tomar el chantaje nuclear como fundamento de su politica exterior, lo que es una verdad historica y la realidad evidente innegable e inocultable de ninguna manera.
					
					Ya es conocido bien por todos el que la administracion Bush fijo la RPDC y otros paises independientes antiimperialistas como "eje del bribon" y blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear y les ejercio la amenaza nuclear.
					
					Tambien la administracion Obama, que abogaba por la construccion del "mundo libre de armas nucleares", no se esfuerza por la desnuclearizacion sino gasta inmensos fondos para la modernizacion de armas nucleares. Por otra parte, toma invariablemente como politica de su pais el ataque preventivo nuclear anti-RPDC y desarrolla con frenesi los ejercicios de guerra nuclear real introduciendo en la Peninsula Coreana los medios de golpe nuclear estrategico de todo tipo.
					
					Durante el mandato de la administracion Obama se aumento varias veces la envergadura y el numero de introduccion de los medios de golpe nuclear estrategico y el caracter provocativo de los entrenamientos de guerra nuclear se ha intensificado considerablemente.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, aumenta al maximo el grado de las maniobras de hostilidad anti-RPDC revelando abiertamente el malsano intento de consolidar mas la presion politica y economica contra esta movilizando todos los paises satelites y aliados so pretexto de ejecutar la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU inventada cuestionando la inevitable opcion de autodefensa de la RPDC.
					
					Esto es el verdadero aspecto del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y la causa raigal de la exacerbacion de la situacion.
					
					EE.UU. trata de realizar la cooperacion militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon- Sur de Corea acusando la RPDC y a la larga persigue la formacion del nuevo bloque militar de caracter agresivo, debido a lo cual en la region de Nordeste Asiatico se aumenta mas el peligro de confrontacion y la guerra.
					
					La realidad demanda apremiantemente intensificar mas nuestro disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa como remedio  omnipotente que garantiza la soberania y la prosperidad del pais y defiende la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Consolidar por todos los medios el poderio nuclear tomando fuertemente en sus manos las armas nucleares constituye la inevitable opcion y el justo ejercicio de derecho de autodefensa de la RPDC, pais soberano, para hacer frente a la  extremada amenaza y chantaje nucleares y las maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Como ya declaramos, tambien en el futuro la RPDC respondera con la contramedida superintransigente a la creciente amenaza de guerra nuclear y el alboroto de presion de EE.UU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama eliminar el "Poder" de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama eliminar el "Poder" de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 4, insistio en que el pueblo surcoreano no podra evitar las grandes desgracias y calamidades si la banda conservadora gana de nuevo en las XX elecciones para los diputados de la "Asamblea Nacional".
					Si la banda de Park Geun-hye ocupa una mayoria de escanos de la "Asamblea Nacional" continuara la dominacion de actual "poder" conflictivo y traidor, senala el articulo y continua:
					
					Tambien, se aumentara aun mas la crisis de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana dando la inquietud y el terror extremos a los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Las actuales fuerzas gobernantes del Sur de Corea es la banda de imperdonables traidores a la nacion que llevaron al fracaso las relaciones Norte-Sur y maniobraron freneticamente por la provocacion de la guerra nuclear.
					
					Si estos belicistas predominan de nuevo la "Asamblea Nacional en la proximas elecciones generales no podran detener la situacion catastrofica de actuales relaciones Norte-Sur ni eliminar el peligro de guerra nuclear.
					
					En una palabra, los habitantes surcoreanos nunca podran dormir a pierna suelta.
					
					Solo cuando se eliminen este "Poder" de confrontacion y la banda traidora el pueblo surcoreano podra gozar de la paz y el derecho a vivir.

articles.title: ACNC refuta insistencia de criminales nucleares en desnuclearizacion
articles.content:
ACNC refuta insistencia de criminales nucleares en desnuclearizacion
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Recientemente, se efectuo la IV "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" bajo el mando de Estados Unidos. 
					En conclusion, fue un lugar de complots de EE.UU., otros paises criminales nucleares y sus seguidores para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la amenaza nuclear que se aumenta en escala mundial.
					
					Los gobernantes de EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea tergiversan la realidad como si el empeoramiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo se debiera a la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Obama dijo que la sociedad internacional "se ve amenazada por las provocaciones consecutivas del Norte de Corea como la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de misil" y que "intensificara la colaboracion internacional con los paises aliados y los acompanantes para la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana". 
					
					Tambien, Abe disparateo que "el mejoramiento de la capacidad nuclear y de misil del Norte de Corea deviene una amenaza directa a la sociedad internacional" y que "es preciso tomar las medidas de sancion mas rigurosas".
					
					En tanto, Park Geun-hye tambien solto los disparates semejantes tales como "nos hemos esforzado juntos por construir un mundo sin armas nucleares, pero el Norte de Corea desafia frontalmente a los esfuerzos de la sociedad internacional", "el mundo libre de armas nucleares debe ser iniciado desde la Peninsula Coreana" y "hare al Norte de Corea entender que no puede subsistir sin renunciar las armas nucleares". 
					
					Todo esto no pasa de ser una absurdidad de quienes a sabiendas del curso del surgimiento del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, se fingen ignorantes de ello. 
					
					El problema controvertido fue ocasionado indudablemente por EE.UU.
					
					La amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. va aumentandose durante varios decenios desde cuando los agresores yanquis insistieron en el "lanzamiento de bomba atomica" sobre la region de la RPDC. 
					
					Se establecio oficialmente como politica estatal de EE.UU. el ataque preventivo nuclear anti-RPDC y se introducen cada ano en la Peninsula Coreana los pertrechos de guerra nuclear de diferentes tipos del imperio desarrollando abiertamente los ejercicios de guerra nuclear. 
					
					En este momento tambien se entregan a los simulacros de guerra nuclear mas de 300 mil efectivos norteamericanos y surcoreanos y enormes medios estrategicos nucleares de EE.UU. como los cazabombarderos nucleares, submarinos nucleares y el colectivo de golpe de portaaviones nuclear. 
					
					No cabe duda de que esto viole gravemente la seguridad y la paz de la RPDC y amenaza directamente el derecho a la existencia del pueblo coreano. 
					
					La amenaza y chantaje nucleares y los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de EE.UU. resultan la causa raigal que llevo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la coyuntura tirante en que pueda estallar una guerra nuclear. 
					
					Dado que EE.UU. y sus satelites amenazan con armas nucleares a la RPDC y se desesperan por denigrar su dignidad y soberania, es muy justo e inevitable que ella haya poseido y las armas nucleares y consolidado su disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					Es una ilogica y climax de engano a la justicia y la paz que EE.UU., el Sur de Corea y Japon hablen de la "amenaza" de alguien. 
					
					EE.UU. es el mayor poseedor de armas nucleares y unico pais que las uso. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos han convertido el suelo surcoreano en la base avanzada nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Japon poseyo de manera explicita e implicita enorme cantidad de plutonio. 
					
					Hoy dia, la sociedad internacional estima que el remedio para la solucion del problema de la Peninsula Coreana es que EE.UU. reconozca a la RPDC como potencia nuclear y mejore las relaciones con ella. 
					
					Despreciando esta opinion, los criminales nucleares acaudillados por EE.UU. hablan de la renuncia nuclear y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, lo cual es el modo de pensamiento ilogico al estilo de Don Quijote y la ilusion nunca realizable. 
					
					Ya hemos aclarado que la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es imposible al margen de la desnuclearizacion del mundo entero. 
					
					Mientras que EE.UU. y otras potencias nucleares no eliminen completamente la amenaza nuclear en la esfera mundial mediante las negociaciones de desarme nuclear y la Casa Blanca no mejore las relaciones con la RPDC, es inimaginable la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La "amenaza del Norte" y la "colaboracion internacional por la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana", de que hablaron en homofonia el caudillo de la guerra nuclear EE.UU. y sus sirvientes, no pasan de ser un alarido agonico de los aturdidos ante el fuerte disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC. 
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. hable ruidosamente de la "amenaza nuclear" de alguien sin hacer caso del problema nuclear de si mismo, tanto mas se revelaran su invariable ambicion de hegemonia mundial y el intento de monopolizacion nuclear. 
					
					La RPDC frustrara rotundamente la absurda insistencia en la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y respondera con el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa a las fuerzas hostiles que denigren aun en lo minimo la soberania y dignidad nacionales.
